thread.title: See More AMGs: 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT C Coupe Debuts!
thread.title_full: See More AMGs: 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT C Coupe Debuts!

author: Steve Siler
title: See More AMGs: 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT C Coupe Debuts!
text:
-The fruitful partnership between Mercedes-Benz and AMG started 50 years ago this year, and to celebrate the occasion, they have developed a new model: the 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT C coupe, which made its debut at the 2017 Detroit auto show alongside the revised 2018 GT and GT S coupes. READ MORE ›› 
-
